1: Last spring, a group of Croac-Croac frogs arrived at The Ribbit-Ribbit Pond.
They came from a farway land, from the mountains and beyond.
4: Until they finally found a new home at the Ribbit-Ribbit Pond.
5: I could not help but notice that the newcomers were different.
7: And the way they spoke was funnier.
So I was a little scared to meet the Croac-Croac frogs in the water.
8: But one day, a few Croac-Croac frogs came and played with us in the pond.
We can all jump very high.
And then I realised that we are quite alike after all.
9: We all can swim very fast.
We all can sing very loud.
10: We all love the smell of flowers.
And we all like to keep our bodies warm in the cold winters.
12: And we all enjoy the same insects.
My new friends can now say “ribbit,” and the Ribbit-Ribbit frogs can now say “croac.”
13: I now have many more friends.
14: I am happy to see the Croac-Croac frogs making this pond their new home.
All frogs are welcome at the Ribbit-Ribbit Pond!
